<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the execve() failed, we should exit. Follow Unix protocol and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// object destructors cloned from the parent process aren&#39;t</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(usage &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting usage collection!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// AIX wait4 does not work well with WNOHANG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(options &amp; WNOHANG))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    return ::wait4(pid, status, options, usage);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For WNOHANG, we use waitid (which supports WNOWAIT) until the child process</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has terminated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  siginfo&#95;t WaitIdInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  WaitIdInfo.si&#95;pid = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitIdRetVal =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">      waitid(P&#95;PID, pid, &amp;WaitIdInfo, WNOWAIT | WEXITED | options);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WaitIdRetVal == -1 || WaitIdInfo.si&#95;pid == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitIdRetVal;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(WaitIdInfo.si&#95;pid == pid);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The child has already terminated, so a blocking wait on it is okay in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// absence of indiscriminate &#96;wait&#96; calls from the current process (which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// would cause the call here to fail with ECHILD).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  return ::wait4(pid, status, options &amp; ~WNOHANG, usage);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a7defb51d8d6a2eba7a428d1a22f08bad">llvm::sys::Wait</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> &amp;PI,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; SecondsToWait,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            std::string &#42;ErrMsg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            std::optional&lt;ProcessStatistics&gt; &#42;ProcStat,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Polling) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">sigaction Act, Old;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;invalid pid to wait on, process not started?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitPidOptions = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  pid&#95;t ChildPid = PI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitUntilTerminates = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SecondsToWait) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WaitUntilTerminates = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;SecondsToWait == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WaitPidOptions = WNOHANG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Install a timeout handler.  The handler itself does nothing, but the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simple fact of having a handler at all causes the wait below to return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with EINTR, unlike if we used SIG&#95;IGN.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    memset(&amp;Act, 0, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Act));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Act.sa&#95;handler = TimeOutHandler;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">    sigemptyset(&amp;Act.sa&#95;mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">    sigaction(SIGALRM, &amp;Act, &amp;Old);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME The alarm signal may be delivered to another thread.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    alarm(&#42;SecondsToWait);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Parent process: Wait for the child process to terminate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a5f126cc7b64d31cd709215b48656d83d">status</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> WaitResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef &#95;&#95;Fuchsia&#95;&#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  rusage <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ProcStat)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ProcStat-&gt;reset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> = sys::wait4(ChildPid, &amp;status, WaitPidOptions, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WaitUntilTerminates &amp;&amp; WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> == -1 &amp;&amp; errno == EINTR);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> != PI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Non-blocking wait.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SecondsToWait &amp;&amp; errno == EINTR &amp;&amp; !Polling) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Kill the child.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">        kill(PI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a>, SIGKILL);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Turn off the alarm and restore the signal handler</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">        alarm(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">        sigaction(SIGALRM, &amp;Old, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Wait for child to die</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME This could grab some other child process out from another</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// waiting thread and then leave a zombie anyway.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (wait(&amp;status) != ChildPid)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/unix/unix-h/#a4a66e59cba198d78f4f5a80c1284a666">MakeErrMsg</a>(ErrMsg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Child timed out but wouldn&#39;t die&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/unix/unix-h/#a4a66e59cba198d78f4f5a80c1284a666">MakeErrMsg</a>(ErrMsg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Child timed out&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">        WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = -2; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Timeout detected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (errno != EINTR) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/unix/unix-h/#a4a66e59cba198d78f4f5a80c1284a666">MakeErrMsg</a>(ErrMsg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Error waiting for child process&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">        WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We exited normally without timeout, so turn off the timer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SecondsToWait &amp;&amp; !WaitUntilTerminates) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">    alarm(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">    sigaction(SIGALRM, &amp;Old, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef &#95;&#95;Fuchsia&#95;&#95;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ProcStat) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::chrono::microseconds UserT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1a420333641cfdaa22a032c78e92aa55">toDuration</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.ru&#95;utime);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::chrono::microseconds KernelT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1a420333641cfdaa22a032c78e92aa55">toDuration</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.ru&#95;stime);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t PeakMemory = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if !defined(&#95;&#95;HAIKU&#95;&#95;) &amp;&amp; !defined(&#95;&#95;MVS&#95;&#95;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PeakMemory = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.ru&#95;maxrss);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#42;ProcStat = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processstatistics">ProcessStatistics</a>&#123;UserT + KernelT, UserT, PeakMemory&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the proper exit status. Detect error conditions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so we can return -1 for them and set ErrMsg informatively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> result = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (WIFEXITED(status)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    result = WEXITSTATUS(status);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">    WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (result == 127) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrMsg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;ErrMsg = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1b09e9233389121e1492219e25daf411">llvm::sys::StrError</a>(ENOENT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (result == 126) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ErrMsg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;ErrMsg = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Program could not be executed&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaitResult;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">long</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgMax = sysconf(&#95;SC&#95;ARG&#95;MAX);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// POSIX requires that &#95;POSIX&#95;ARG&#95;MAX is 4096, which is the lowest possible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value for ARG&#95;MAX on a POSIX compliant system.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">long</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgMin = &#95;POSIX&#95;ARG&#95;MAX;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This the same baseline used by xargs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">long</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EffectiveArgMax = 128 &#42; 1024;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EffectiveArgMax &gt; ArgMax)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EffectiveArgMax = ArgMax;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EffectiveArgMax &lt; ArgMin)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EffectiveArgMax = ArgMin;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// System says no practical limit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ArgMax == -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Conservatively account for space required by environment variables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">long</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HalfArgMax = EffectiveArgMax / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgLength = Program.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Arg : Args) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure that we do not exceed the MAX&#95;ARG&#95;STRLEN constant on Linux, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// does not have a constant unlike what the man pages would have you</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// believe. Since this limit is pretty high, perform the check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unconditionally rather than trying to be aggressive and limiting it to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Linux only.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Arg.size() &gt;= (32 &#42; 4096))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ArgLength += Arg.size() + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ArgLength &gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(HalfArgMax)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"></CodeLine>
